VisualAge Web Parts

  • Adds new visual parts to the VisualAge palette

    • text (attributes for fonts and links)
    • images
    • forms
    • user interface widgets for forms

  • Can reuse existing non-visual parts

    • database
    • transaction managers
    • communications protocols
